name: Neovibe Innovative Technologies
description:
Neovibe provides innovative information technology solutions and business processes to its clients across the globe. We are a group of young enthusiastic software professionals with a dynamic vision to design and deliver cost effective software solutions with excellent quality well within the timelines.
Our core business values are therefore, to discover opportunities for creating transformation; to use our knowledge and expertise in supporting positive change and to enable people in producing powerful new developments.
